Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: stephie
Reviews.Content: I switched from my old CRT TV (yep, really) to this one recently, what a  difference. It has forward facing speakers so the sound is very good, and the picture quality, especially on the 1080 stations is just beautiful. The difference between CRT and digital is pretty amazing.It has an easy to use remote, setting up is easy, and if you're a newbie like me (any left?), more intricate setting up like subtitles and such takes a min. or so but it's pretty straight forward.I know there are much more expensive brands and TV's with more bells and whistles but if you want 26" with very good sound and beautiful picture quality, this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: Clayton Young "ClaySF"
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE:  Vizio will not honor warranty if you purchase "from an unauthorized reseller."  And good luck determining which sellers are authorized before you buy!  Our set developed a line of dead pixels three months after we bought it.  Vizio tech support determined that it was indeed a warranty-covered flaw and agreed to exchange it for a new unit.  Then, two hours later they called to renege on the agreement, asserting that the Amazon third party dealer we purchased from was "unauthorized."  As for Amazon, it refused to help because warranty issues are not part of the alphabet in their "A-Z Guaranty."  I have no idea if Vizio's warranty exclusion is industry standard. But in my opinion it exposes a serious flaw in Amazon's business model if customers, searching for lowest prices on a given item, are not warned that by purchasing through Amazon.com, you may be voiding the manufacturer warranty. In future I, for one, will think twice before buying any electronic or other consumer product from Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: Shut off the gimmicks & use the custom settings
Reviews.Author: J. Pawlowski
Reviews.Content: Contrast ratio seems to be around 1200:1 when comparing it to my other LCDs with known contrast ratios. Forget about "dynamic" contrast ratios. The term is almost meaningless, & a gimmick. Speaking of gimmicks this set is loaded with almost useless gimmicks or features that sound good in writing, but just make the TV look & sound terrible if you use them. The factory picture mode presets must have be made by a blind person. All of them make the picture blurry, & over saturated with color to the point all flesh tones look bright blurry deep orange. The overall picture scene looks like it was shot under those ugly yellow-orange sodium-vapor streetlights.It would have been nice if at least 1 or 2 of the picture mode presets looked fair.The good news is if you use the custom settings, you can make the picture look as good, clear, & sharp as any good TV... as long as you don't need a super-bright picture. Pushing the brightness or contrast too high will result in an over washed, over pushed picture with poor color, & people looking cartoon-like. I suggest contrast & brightness settings of 33-50 for  most evening viewing, but no higher than 50 or you'll loose a lot of quality. Color at 28, sharpness at 17.LEDs get dimmer over time the harder you push them, & the more you use them. So a lower back-light setting will make your LEDs stay bright longer. I currently have the LED back-light set at 40, & I don't recommend leaving it higher than 60 very long.Set adaptive luma off, it's terrible. Set color enhancement off too. In the custom color temp settings, R gain 70, G gain 50, B gain 53, R offset 53, G offset 50, B offset 54.Noise reduction off, but for a real grainy or blocky picture it helps a little on high. Ambient light sensor off.In Audio, SRS TruSurround is terrible. Leave it off. TruVolume on. Equalizer settings off. Bass & Treble at 0 (flat). Turning up the bass won't give you bass. It'll boost the lower midrange a little, & make the dialog sound like someone's speaking through a hollow toilet roll tube. The sound is almost as bad as it is in my laptop which only has a pair of 1/4"x3/4" speakers in it. Shutting off almost all the gimmicks made it sound best. Regardless what they say the sound power is, I'd guess it's only 1/8 to 1/4 a watt per side.TruVolume does turn down some loud commercials & some loud scenes. But other times it seems to randomly & erratically turn the sound up & down for no reason. Had to turn up the volume almost all the way on some quiet channels, then turn it down almost all the way on some loud channels.It picked up 1 more channel off the air than any of my other TVs did. Channels did not cut out or pixelate during bad weather like they did on my other TVs too. So the tuner is above average.I also have a PC connected to this for a dual display. Disappointed that none of the color & sharpness settings function, when displaying the PC. These worked on my other TVs when connected to a PC. Really don't want to ruin my graphics card settings when playing Netflix through it. The terrible adaptive luma (a useless annoying gimmick) can't be shut off when displaying the PC either.4 stars for being a beautiful picture with customs settings for what I paid for it & shipping. 1 star off for loading it full of useless or terrible gimmicks, features, & factory presets obviously set up by a blind deaf person. I can see a lot of people not used to tweaking their TV settings sending this unit back. Out of the box, using the factory & default settings, this is a terrible TV.Wish I could find how to access the service menu to fix some of the presets to something useful & watchable, but the old tricks to get to the Vizio service menu don't seem to work on this model. What's the new service mode/menu sequence on these newer models?

Reviews.Title: Nice for the Price
Reviews.Author: S. Ropp
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio TV I have owned and so far both are trouble free.  The picture on this set is gorgeous as is the sound.  The connections are adequate and I am very pleased.  It is lightweight and easy to set up, as well. I was a little hesitant with only two other reviews so vastly different from each other.  It is pretty evident that the negative review was due to a defective "lemon" which can happen with any product.

Reviews.Title: great TV, great service
Reviews.Author: Warren M. Feuer
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Vizio from Electronica Direct and am pleased with both the tv and the vendor.  The shipping was very quick ( 4 days from California to NYC) and the package arrived in the same condition as if I had just picked it up at a neighborhood store.  The TV picture and sound are great.  I use it in my bedroom and felt I did not need 1080p and my instinct was correct.  Would gladly buy again from them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Built in Speaker, Terrible Screen.
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The Vizio E261VA 26-inch television may look good at first, but the actual picture quality is inferior to more recognized brandname models like Sony or Samsung. The screen looks fine when viewed from eye level, but the second you look at the screen from a higher or lower angle, the brightness, contrast, and color change significantly. Even when viewed from the correct height, the contrast is average at best, and I'm saying that after having tried all the built in picture options including the custom setting that I tinkered with for nearly half an hour. The one positive thing that can be said about the Vizio is that the sound quality from the built in speaker is excellent. However, that is no excuse for the poor screen quality.

Reviews.Title: Great uint
Reviews.Author: David Knowlton
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the reviews and found this in a box store for more money I bought it through Amazon. Did get the unit in just 3 days and mounted it in my camper, after getting the camp site all set up the following weekend I turn on the Vizio and the power antena and did a quick set up and the picture was great!!! The sound was very good as well! Good Job!!

Reviews.Title: I have been extremely pleased with my Vizio purchases.
Reviews.Author: Beth S. O'Donnell "libba"
Reviews.Content: This is not our first Vizio purchase. In fact this is the second of this exact TV that we have bought. The picture quality is extremely good, and it has a sleek design. For the money I doubt you could find a better value. I bought also the Vizio blu ray with Internet capability it also is great.  Highly reccomend this brand.

Reviews.Title: Very happy.
Reviews.Author: J.B. "Educated Buyer"
Reviews.Content: We've been very happy with this Vizio TV.  The picture, sound, and connections are all just as we hoped they would be.  We looked for weeks checking out many brands, but we decided on the Vizio because of the better specs and the fact that the speakers/sound was much better on this TV than on the LG, Samsung or Toshiba models.  The picture is also as good or better, in our opinion.  I would recommend this TV to anyone.  We also like that it is very thin and allows the TV to be very close to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Very thin & light
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: The sleek look of this tv is so cool. The stand becomes an integral part of the product design. Of course, the picture is sharp & crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: N. A. Syesta
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my girlfriend and she loves it.  She said that it was light, easy to setup, and the picture/audio were perfect.  She has been using it as a PC monitor and to watch Blu-Ray movies on it.  My girlfriend is very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Good Luck if it breaks.
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Olson "oldfolkiemom"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 9 months ago. When I first received it, I was thoroughly happy with the picture and sound. But last week, the left side of the screen started getting a bright section to it, and the right side was dark. Then it would go black altogether after a few minutes on. I called VIZIO and they said it was under warranty and that they would ship me a re certified one  a few inches bigger. Then they told me they would have to charge my credit card the amount I originally paid for the TV, and once my broken TV was shipped back satisfactorily, they would credit my credit card. Well, it's been 2 weeks since they charged my card. The tracking number from UPS says a label has been made but the item not yet shipped. In my opinion, this is terrible customer service. They should have sent me a new TV the very next day! Plus, I forgot to mention, I had to physically take 2 pictures of the screen and email it to them before they would even listen to my case. So this has been a complete nightmare and I doubt that I will ever buy another VIZIO product if this is how they treat their customers.

Reviews.Title: Vizio doesn't honor warranty!!!
Reviews.Author: Dan Rohlfing
Reviews.Content: I would have given this TV very good marks, for the first 8-9 months that I owned it, but then the sound stopped working. No problem, it's under warranty: HA! After testing it on other inputs, Vizio finally determined that the HDMI port had an issue and opened a service ticket. I uploaded my Amazon receipt and was informed the next day that they wouldn't honor the warranty because my receipt was from electronics101deals (via Amazon) and their records showed that they had sold it to WalMart.So, I said, I purchased from the worlds largest online retailer, which often uses 3rd party retailers. Doesn't matter, they said, you're out of luck.I guess my only recourse is to use the component inputs and complain online about what a worthless company Vizio apparently is and that they don't value their customers or honor their warranties.Ok, rant over.

Reviews.Title: A Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Critque Extraordinaire "Advice to Live By...."
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio I have purchased in the last year...I have them hooked to my desktop computer as dual monitors.  Works fine...Easy to hang on wall... though it requires a separate kit...Wish I had bought them at the same time and had the same models... as color issues prevail when trying to get both monitors in sync color wise...Great pictureGreat colorI would recommend and buy again....

Reviews.Title: Perfect Secondary TV
Reviews.Author: jpogar
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for a spare bedroom.  Picture is great, easy to hang. I would have given it 5 stars except for one thing.  The HDMI inputs are on the side of the TV and they do "stick out" 2-3 inches when you install the cable.  Takes away from the clean look but other than that, very happy with the price and function of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: This Vizio is great as a computer monitor and game station....as well as a  TVMy 13 year old just loves it

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Bully Boy TX "Skip" "Skip"
Reviews.Content: We received the TV much sooner than we expected.  It was exactly as described and is perfect for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: david woltemate
Reviews.Content: Ordered this based solely on reviews on Amazon. We spent a lot of time trying to get a good picture, but there was a graininess that could not be eliminated. We also used the same HDMI connection to compare to 2 other TV's in the house, both looked great compared to this. Maybe a defective unit, the picture on the Vizio E241-A1 24" HDTV that we used to compare was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv!
Reviews.Author: Stamp Girl
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my bedroom.  I love that it has a headphone jack and 2 HDMI ports. I watch a lot of blu-ray discs on it.  I'm happy with the sound and picture.  I would buy it again.  It was very easy to set up, even without the complete manual.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful to join the flat screen generation!
Reviews.Author: ItalianDish
Reviews.Content: I could not imagine what the shouting was about when it came to flat screens and I waited till my old, fat TV died to make the switch.  But!  I love the picture, and a football game is actually worth watching.Why did I wait so long?

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: T. Foster "retsof"
Reviews.Content: I like Vizio products.  I needed this one for my patio.  The size was exactly what I wanted and as it turned out the picture quality is really good.  However, I was surprised to find that the "audio out" on this model will not work on both head phones and still work independently for the regular volume.  You see, we have one person in our family who is hard of hearing, so I wanted to be able to have that person use headphones and control the volume on a personal basis while the rest of us listened to the TV at normal volume.  BAD NEWS....... we can do either or, but not both on this model.  My other Vizios in the house will do both, so I guess this one was not what I expected.  Be aware of this if this is an issue for you.

Reviews.Title: Terrible TV, OK Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: M. J. Kline
Reviews.Content: This is a terrible TV; it is OK only if viewed from exactly the height of the screen.  The picture darkens at any angle except head-on, and is extremely dark if viewed from any angle below the screen.  I bought it for a bedroom to put on a dresser and it is unwatchable. The stand isn't adjustable; and to make matters worse, the top of the screen is angled back a few degrees.This seems to me to be a computer monitor which has HDMI ports added, not at all a TV screen that can be viewed from most angles.  There was nothing about this in the description.  The Amazon customer service rep told me this is how these LED TVs work.I will be keeping the set only because it does make an OK computer monitor using the Game setting.

Reviews.Title: improper packaging...but nice product.
Reviews.Author: C. Moore
Reviews.Content: received this tv on time, as expected. however, the packing was very poor. the tv was in it's original box; nothing more. hence, there was a small ding on the lower right hand speaker due to the poor packing. (for electronic equipment, you'd think that it would be common sense to package it better...) to add to the lack of common sense, the box, clearly stating 'VIZIO 26" LED LCD TV,' is a fantastic invitation for someone who wants a new 26" tv to steal from your side door, fully aware of what it is - no secret there. i would advise contacting the seller to ensure proper packaging.the tv itself is great. crystal clear quality, great sound for a front speaker, nice back lighting, and overall a nice size for video games. the quality of the tv i would rate a 5, but due to the absolutely sucky packaging, i rated it a 4.

Reviews.Title: Not packaged as new!
Reviews.Author: Jean Goldsborough
Reviews.Content: Buyer Beware:  my television was packed completely in NON-manufacturer packaging and materials. The item is advertised as BRAND NEW and while it looks new once out of the box, clearly the packaging was not original.  The owners manual was a bunch of folded and stapled photocopied pages.  While the TV works fine, I do feel a bit suspicious of where it came from and why no original manufacturer packaging is included when it is advertised as NEW.  I also know that if I have any problems with the TV I am out of luck as VIZIO will not honor the manufacturer's warranty when purchased from an unauthorized retailer. Boo-hoo!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Brad Suber
Reviews.Content: This TV has excellent color and picture with overall good performance after approximately 6 months of use with my computer as a monitor.

Reviews.Title: Troubles!!!
Reviews.Author: Mario Franco
Reviews.Content: This new TV set have a technical problem with the volume that goes up or down by itself. Color, no matter what you do, is yellowish.i

Reviews.Title: Timely & Good Quality
Reviews.Author: Maria Favela
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item as a Christmas gift for my brother and his family.  The item arrived on time and was just as described.

Reviews.Title: Great Pix, Great Price
Reviews.Author: George Strella
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and I am well pleased with it. The price was right and the features are superb.

Reviews.Title: PROBLEMS WITH PICTURE & BRIGHTNESS FROM BEGINNING.
Reviews.Author: Patrick DiRosa
Reviews.Content: BRIGHTNESS OF PICTURE DIMISHES AFTER A FEW MINUTE (BY ITSELF-OWN ITS OWN)  ONLY WAY TO CORRECT BRIGHTNESS IS TO TURN TV OFF THEN BACK ON.  VERY DISAPPOINTED.

Reviews.Title: Reconditioned and works great
Reviews.Author: teevee
Reviews.Content: Even though it is not "new", it has been reconditioned, and is working very well.  It appears like new, and the picture is sharp and clear.

Reviews.Title: Nice surveillance monitor
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Stephens
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a monitor for our security cameras. Nothing too fancy.It does come with a remote, and I'm assuming the speakers work, although I have never used them.It is edge lit LED, so you get crisper edge details. After a year of daily use it has performed flawlessly.No dead pixels, and worth what I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for a small space
Reviews.Author: dockie
Reviews.Content: I have an old entertainment center that only had room for a 23 inch HD tv I purchased about 7 years ago. I wanted to get a 26 inch but couldn't find one because, although the space I had was wide enough, the height was a problem. I finally found this tv where the stand is behind the tv so doesn't add to the height. The picture is very good. It is a 720p but I really don't notice the difference from my 23 inch 1080i tv it replaced. Love having the larger screen. I have it in my small den (really a 2nd bedroom) and is plenty big for this room. My only criticism is that when I change channels, it takes a couple of seconds to change.

Reviews.Title: Really like it
Reviews.Author: Mount Prospect
Reviews.Content: Newer flat screen televisions have small speakers that compromise the quality of the audio, especially when placed in an enclosed area, such as an armoire.  This speaker design allows the sound to come through fully and not sound muffled.

Reviews.Title: Definite winner !
Reviews.Author: BamaBob
Reviews.Content: Front facing speakers give excellent sound and picture quality is very good. Perhaps the most notable feature is the outstanding internal antennae which receives all local HD channels which my other 5 TV's will not do.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E261VA 26-Inch 60Hz LED LCD Class Edge Lit Razor HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Hilarie Zani
Reviews.Content: Good price, great picture, easy to set up, great customer service (very helpful and friendly)  Sorry I didn't purchase this sooner.

Reviews.Title: Shipped item  was defective.
Reviews.Author: Engineer "golfer"
Reviews.Content: It was a defective product that I received, so I cannot rate it. I have another Vizio product  that is great, a 32" TV. However Amazon paid return shipping and gave me a refund, so I am happy.

Reviews.Title: OMG!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wow at first I was skeptical about buying any electronics on Amazon, but once I got the TV OMG! The picture is gorgeous the sound is even better I can leave the it on in my bedroom, and think that the other TVs on in the front room,, I use it for my computer and I love the thin screen. but so far so great! I will continue to purchase items from authorized dealers on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: JRP
Reviews.Content: The reviews I read we're pretty much on target.  The picture was diminished when seeing the screen at a less than ninty degree angle on regular cable.  However on HD channels, it was very good.Visio makes a very good High Depth unit.  We have the 65" 3-D unit.  It is comparable to the same size Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Whatzleft
Reviews.Content: TV arrived packaged very well, set up was easy, picture and sound are great.  This was a great buy for this TV!!!  I'm happy!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and in good condition... Bought as a gift and the recipient loves it... good picture and quality for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Jerry NKTelco, Inc
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture and with the 2 HDMi inputs it makes it easy to connect the devices to for HD

Reviews.Title: JUST WHAT I ORDERED
Reviews.Author: NORM
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS THE BEST PRICE I COULD FIND ON MY INTERNET SEARCH.  IT WAS DELIVERED EXCEPTIONALLY FAST FOR STANDARD SHIPPING.  I WAS SURPRISED THAT IT WAS SHIPPED FROM WAL-MART, AS THAT IS NOT WHERE I ORDERED.  IT IS A GREAT TV WITH A VERY GOOD PICTURE QUALITY.

Reviews.Title: Nice sleek design w/ clear image
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: This is the second Razor I've bought and both have good image and the design is sleek and very compact. Perfect for wall mounting. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: We purchased this unit for our bedroom, and use it with the leaf plus amplified HDTV antenna and a blue ray player to get the major network channels, PBS, Netflix and Amazon Prime. Great picture & sound.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Hellena Rae Sutter
Reviews.Content: We didnt want to big, or care if it was used, so we ordered this and the picture is awesome. We couldnt believe the sound quality either that came from it. I would recommend this tv to anyone looking for something small for an office or a kids room.

Reviews.Title: just right
Reviews.Author: Ver-Le
Reviews.Content: This is my second VIZIO. It's the perfect size for the space. I like the clear picture, light weight, slim shape, easy connections, easy to understand menu.

Reviews.Title: Superb picture quality and audio.
Reviews.Author: SST77
Reviews.Content: I would happily continue to purchase TVs by VIZIO in the future.  The picture quality is above and beyond anything that I have ever experienced before.  Brilliantly sharp, beautiful and flawless are words that come to mind. No complaints at all regarding the product in general, although I returned my purchase for other reasons- these being the physical condition and lack of any warranty per the, "Refurbished" unit that I was sent.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: J. Sekovski "inspired cook"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister. She loves it, especially the sound quality. She uses it in a smaller room and says the size is perfect. From having bought other tvs, LED and Plasma, it seems to me that for the LED it is very important to match the size of the tv to the room. To truly appreciate the picture quality of an LED one needs to be the right watching distance from the tv.

Reviews.Title: Slim, good looking flat screen with bright picture - great price for an LCD of this size
Reviews.Author: Fisher man
Reviews.Content: Bought this after a smaller Emerson LCD went belly up due to what I found out is a common power supply problem with Emersons.  Lucky for me I had double warranty coverage via my credit card.  Researched a lot of 20 - 26 in. TVs and settled on this one as I value Vizio's solid reputation.  Primarily use this TV outside and it is nice and bright in the daytime - better at night of course.  On-board sound is reasonable, but I am running a little pair of computer speakers for extra bass and volume outside.  Plugged in to the headphone jack, the add-on speakers are controlled with the romote control which is nice.  I am running it on coax cable at standard def, and it has the normal amount of graininess I see on my other standard def TVs.  I have not tried this 720p with an HD signal, although I expect a Vizio will do just fine in this mode.

Reviews.Title: secondary TV
Reviews.Author: Dale R. Balousek
Reviews.Content: It was what we wanted for our second TV in the area available. The size was a good fit with the stand.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E261VA
Reviews.Author: Lex Ink
Reviews.Content: We bought the Vizio E260 last year and loved it.  This is a newer model and it has an excellent picture and very good sound quality - which we supplement by connecting our home entertainment sound system.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Susan Welch
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it.  It's a great tv for the price and the picture and sound are really nice as well.I would definitely consider another Vizio when I upgrade my flat panel.My only two complaints are that the package was delivered - and left on my front stoop for all the world to see.Good thing it wasn't stolen.It was delivered two days prior to the notice I was given in the shipping email, and it was just in the manufacturer's box.  Nothing to "hide" the fact of what it was.  That brings up my other problem.  Since it was shipped this way and I was not home to get it as I planned to be - my daughter saw it and so she got her Christmas present a week ahead of time.Perhaps if I would have said, that this was a gift - maybe it would have been shipped differently? - I don't know.Overall it's a nice tv and she is happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Good set for the price.
Reviews.Author: TOM
Reviews.Content: The tv has a crisp bright picture which adjusts nicely as the room light changes. And the sound is adquate for a small set.

Reviews.Title: GOOD TV FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: kevin stone
Reviews.Content: great picture. the only thing i don't like is the adaptive luma. i can't get a great picture when i turn it off. it keeps dimming & getting brighter automatically when on.

Reviews.Title: Vizeo TV
Reviews.Author: Wendy P
Reviews.Content: This tv came in safe and sound! That was my biggest worry. It's a very nice tv. We had to choose one a little smaller to fit inside a particular entertainment center but are very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: The color is Terrible
Reviews.Author: jlb
Reviews.Content: I bought this Vizio E261VA to replace a Vizio M260VA that was stolen.  I have tried for 2 weeks to get the color adjusted and the picture quality is not consistent from scene to scene or from one show to another.  The M260VA was perfect out of the box.  I plan on returning the E261VA.

ProductInfo.Features:
Edge Lit Razor LED backlighting for brilliant color and contrast
SRS  HD + SRS
Thin LED Design: TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 25.35'' x 17.01'' x 5.87'', TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 25.35'' x 17.01'' x 1.54''
Ambient Light Sensing technology
Two HDMI ports
ProductInfo.Name: VIZIO E261VA 26-Inch 60Hz LED LCD Class Edge Lit Razor HDTV (Black)
